text: Postcards from the Edge is a 1990 American comedy-drama movie. It is based on a novel of the same name by Carrie Fisher. Fisher also wrote the screenplay. The movie is about a recovering addict trying to restart her acting career. Meryl Streep plays Suzanne. Annette Bening plays Evelyn Ames. Shirley MacLaine plays Doris. This movie was released on September 14, 1990. It got positive reviews. Its box office was also positive. == Other websites == * Category:1990 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies # Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies directed by Mike Nichols
title: Postcards from the Edge (movie)
